bibl.title: Letter from Florence M. Read to Henry Rose Carter, August 31, 1921

div1.p: Read sends Carter excerpts of Hanson's and White's letters.

div1.head: Letter from Florence M. Read to Henry Rose Carter, August 31, 1921
div1.opener:
ADMINISTRATIVE STAFF
----
WICKLIFFE ROSE
GENERAL DIRECTOR
JOHN A. FERRELL, M.D.
DIRECTOR FOR
THE UNITED STATES
VICTOR G. HEISEN, M.D.
DIRECTOR FOR
THE EAST
H. H. HOWARD, M.D.
DIRECTOR FOR
THE WEST INDIES
F. F. RUSSELL, M.D.
DIRECTOR OF
PUBLIC HEALTH LABORATORIES
MEMBERS
----
GEORGE E. VINCENT
CHAIRMAN
HERMANN M. BIGGS
WALLACE BUTTRICK
SIMON FLEXNER
RAYMOND B. FOSDICK
FREDERICK T. GATES
EDWIN O. JORDAN
T. MITCHELL PRUDDEN
JOHN D. ROCKEFELLER, JR.
WICKLIFFE ROSE
FREDERICK STRAUSS
VICTOR C. VAUGHAN
WILLIAM H. WELCH
EDWIN N. EMBREE
SECRETARY
FLORENCE M. READ
ASSISTANT SECRETARY
THE ROCKEFELLER FOUNDATION
INTERNATIONAL HEALTH BOARD
61 BROADWAY NEW YORK
August 31, 1921
Dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
You will find enclosed excerpts from letters
recently received from Doctor Hanson and Doctor White.
Doctor Hanson seems to have conducted his campaign with
great energy and wisdom. Doctor White thinks highly of
his work under great difficulties.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Florence M. Read
Assistant Secretary Doctor Henry R Carter
New Glasgow Post Office
Amherst County
Virginia
FMR:HJW E 1
